mapper.update: INSERT INTO THSPPPAGUUP (I_IDSPPPAGUUP, I_IDSKPD, V_SPP, C_ANGG_TAHUN, I_PGUN_REKAM, D_PGUN_REKAM, I_PGUN_UBAH, D_PGUN_UBAH) SELECT T.I_ID, T.I_IDSKPD, T.V_SPP, T.C_ANGG_TAHUN, T.I_PGUN_REKAM, T.D_PGUN_REKAM, T.I_PGUN_UBAH, T.D_PGUN_UBAH FROM TRSPPPAGUUP T WHERE T.C_ANGG_TAHUN = #{tahunlama}
mapper.select: SELECT I_ID AS "key", C_AKUN ||'-'|| N_AKUN AS "title", 'true' AS "lazy", 'true' AS "folder", C_AKUN AS "kodeakun", C_AKTIF AS "isaktif" FROM TRBAS T WHERE T.I_IDINDUK = 1

SELECT I_ID AS "key", C_AKUN ||'-'||N_AKUN AS "title", CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT (x.I_ID) FROM TRBAS x WHERE X.I_IDINDUK = T.I_ID) > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END as "lazy", 'true' AS "folder",C_AKUN AS "kodeakun",C_AKTIF AS "isaktif" FROM TRBAS T WHERE T.I_IDINDUK = #{induk}
